https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3uCl1EoSwBeSqvnBrKsSPPvfI6B.jpg A university teacher gets caught shoplifting by a security guard, who won’t let him go. He becomes his new best friend and says ‘I won’t call the cops if you come and have a pint with me’. From there a twisted romance of sorts unfolds. A Patch of Fog
